description.value:
Primary Energy: Earth 2 (manipulating soil and stone) Supporting Energy: Space 1 (close range) Range: Close, 30 ft. Duration: Instantaneous (or 1 hour for changes) Total Cost: 3 Energy per effect Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Earth Potential + Earth Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Choose one: (1) Excavate or move up to 5ft cube of loose earth, (2) Shape earth/stone into basic forms, (3) Change color or texture of earth/stone in 5ft cube. Changes last 1 hour. Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 2ft cube, 2 = 5ft cube, 3 = 10ft cube, 4 = permanent changes, 5 = 20ft cube + permanent

---
